name: Masterpieces of Modern Drama
description: This course will study works by the major Italian playwrights of the Twentieth Century, including two of Italyâ€™s Literature Nobel Prize winners, Luigi Pirandello and Dario Fo. The course includes a component designed to enhance students' research experience.
